title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin discusses Russell Wilson getting traded to the Broncos and why he'll be successful despite a loaded division in the AFC West. He believes Aaron Rodgers made the smart decision by returning to the Packers and why this gives him the best chance to win another Super Bowl. He reacts to more breaking news out of the NFL with the Colts trading QB Carson Wentz to Washington. Plus, Nick Wright from First Things First joins the show to argue with Colin about Wilson's potential success in Denver. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
